ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Demonstrates overriding the LeftAxesPanel Template to create a true EEG style chart, where many traces are included on the same chart.
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to create a Vertically Stacked chart where multiple YAxis are occupying different locations on the chart. This allows series to overlap each other as they are on the same SciChartSurface.
This is achieved by overriding the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Visuals.SciChartSurface~LeftAxesPanelTemplate.html']SciChartSurface.LeftAxesPanelTemplate[/url]. This API may also be used to override how Axis are arranged on the Left, Top, Right or Bottom of a SciChartSurface.
[i][b]Note: [/b][/i] [i]it is also possible to arrange multiple SciChartSurfaces in a Grid or ItemsControl to get the same effect, where series do not need to overlap.[/i]
[b][i]Interactivity Options[/i][/b]
- Drag the Chart to zoom. - Double click to reset zoom.
